credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Number Two
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description: On black background lined like an electronic monitor, the text: "Number Two x // A Film by Jean-Luc Godard." Followed by a photograph of a woman's face in lower right. Inscription: "It's my body, it's my kitchen, my kids. It's too much, and yet, it's not enough", lower left; "Distributed by The Other Cinema", bottom left.
name: Poster
